    • Method Detail

      • loginUser

        public void loginUser(java.lang.String enteredName,
                      java.lang.String enteredPassword)
        Function called by the LoginFragment when the Login button is clicked.
        Parameters:
        enteredName - The name entered to perform login in the login fragment
        enteredPassword - The password entered to perform login in the login fragment
        Pre-Condition
        EnteredName cannot be null, empty string or single character. EnteredPassword similar. Both parameters must meet the username/password requirements.
        Post-Condition
        The user will be logged into the server

      • registerUser

        public com.example.tyudy.ticket2rideclient.common.User registerUser(java.lang.String enteredName,
                                                                    java.lang.String enteredPassword)
        Function called by the RegisterFragment when the register button is clicked. Registers the user on the server if they have entered a valid user name and password
        Parameters:
        enteredName - The name entered to perform login in the login fragment
        enteredPassword - The password entered to perform login in the login fragment
        Returns:
        A User object reflecting the registered user, or null if the userName or password was invalid
        Pre-Condition
        EnteredName cannot be null, empty string or single character. EnteredPassword similar. Both parameters must meet the username/password requirements.
        Post-Condition
        The user will be registered in the server database

      • replaceModelsGames

        public void replaceModelsGames(java.util.ArrayList<com.example.tyudy.ticket2rideclient.common.TTRGame> gList)
        Replaces the current list of games in the model with the new one, called in the ListGamesCommand execute
        Parameters:
        gList - A new list of games for the model
        Pre-Condition
        gList cannot be null. It can however be empty.
        Post-Condition
        The ClientModel will be updated accordingly to the information passed in.

      • createGame

        public void createGame()
        Called when the create game button is clicked in the GameSelectionFragment. Creates a game based off of the current user and will add it to the games stored on the server.
        Pre-Condition
        The user must be logged in and not already a part of a game currently in progress, or waiting to start
        Post-Condition
        The user will create a new game which people can join

      • startGame

        public void startGame()
        Called when the user is ready to start the game
        Pre-Condition
        The command must come from the owner of the game, and the game must have been previously created
        Post-Condition
        The game will begin

      • getGameList

        public void getGameList()
        A getter method to display all current games the server is hosting
        Pre-Condition
        The user must be in the game lobby view to see the updates
        Post-Condition
        The game list will be updated every time the poller polls

      • getCommands

        public void getCommands(int index)
        A getter method to receive a specific command from the server's command queue
        Parameters:
        index - The index of the command in the queue
        Pre-Condition
        Index must be >= 0, and not out of range of the server's command queue
        Post-Condition
        All commands after the given index will be received

      • joinGame

        public void joinGame(com.example.tyudy.ticket2rideclient.common.TTRGame gameToJoin)
        Joins the currentUser into the game that was clicked on in the GameSelectionFragment.
        Parameters:
        gameToJoin - Game that the currentUser is going to join
        Pre-Condition
        The user must have been logged in, and not a part of any other active games. The given parameter cannot be null.
        Post-Condition
        The user will be put into the chosen game

      • checkPassword

        public boolean checkPassword(java.lang.String pass)
        A validation method for if a password is valid when registering a new user
        Parameters:
        pass - The entered password
        Returns:
        True if valid, false otherwise
        Pre-Condition
        The given parameter cannot be null. It must contain between 2 and 10 characters.
        Post-Condition
        The password will be deemed valid

      • setContext

        public void setContext(android.support.v4.app.FragmentActivity jeffery)
        A method to update the current context of the application
        Parameters:
        jeffery - Bless his soul. He's the given context.
        Pre-Condition
        Jeffery cannot be null.
        Post-Condition
        The current context will be set to Jeffery. Good boy.

      • getContext

        public android.support.v4.app.FragmentActivity getContext()
        A getter to get the current context of the application
        Returns:
        The current context (A.K.A. Jeffery)
        Pre-Condition
        None
        Post-Condition
        The current context will be returned. May be null.

      • addChat

        public void addChat(java.lang.String chat)
        The method used to update the chat-log in the ClientModel
        Parameters:
        chat - The chat message received from the server
        Pre-Condition
        The given chat cannot be null. It may be an empty string.
        Post-Condition
        The chat message will be added to the current chat-log

      • sendChatMessage

        public void sendChatMessage(java.lang.String chatMessage)
        The method called when the 'Send' button is pressed in the chat fragment
        Parameters:
        chatMessage - The entered message to send to all users
        Pre-Condition
        The message cannot be null, or empty.
        Post-Condition
        The message will be delivered to the server

      • claimPath

        public void claimPath(com.example.tyudy.ticket2rideclient.common.cities.Path path)
        Called when a path is claimed.
        Parameters:
        path - The path to be claimed
        Pre-Condition
        Path cannot be null, and must be a registered/valid path
        Post-Condition
        The server will be notified of the update

      • getModelPaths

        public java.util.ArrayList<com.example.tyudy.ticket2rideclient.common.cities.Path> getModelPaths()
        A getter for all of the paths contained in the ClientModel (which is all paths in the game)
        Returns:
        All of the paths in the game
        Pre-Condition
        There must be a current game being played by the current user.
        Post-Condition
        The list of paths will be returned

      • reset

        public void reset()
        A reset method used to reset the data in the ClientModel
        Pre-Condition
        None
        Post-Condition
        The ClientModel will be wiped and replaced with a clean slate
